Paragraph .16 of AU-C section 580B, , requires the auditor to obtain written representations from management and, when appropriate, those charged with governance about whether they believe significant assumptions used in making accounting estimates are reasonable. AU-C section 580B also states that written representations from management do not provide sufficient appropriate audit evidence on their own about any of the matters with which they deal.
